overview_of_class: This year-long workshop, meeting a few to several times each quarter, provides an opportunity for PhD students in US history and the instructor to read, critique and discuss drafts of dissertation proposals and chapters, scholarly articles, papers for conference presentation, and other professional materials. Its goals are to speed students' progress, improve their work, enhance their skills in explaining their scholarship and commenting on others' work, and provide them a supportive community.
name: Divisional Seminar in American History
subject: HISTORY
